title: Richard Vague: Myths and Landmarks in US Economic History
itunes:title: Richard Vague: Myths and Landmarks in US Economic History
description: Economic historian and INET board member Richard Vague, talks about his latest book, The Illustrated Business History of the United States, which reveals a number of misconceptions and myths about the development of the US economy
